Articles.Content: I use better atmospheres and Interstellar on another save but they dont really offer what im looking for in terms of eve. I want to change the colour of eves atmosphere to match that of venus. Any ideas how?

Thread moved--support is for problems you're having with the game, not things you want to do.

You can use KittopiaTech, available in the Addon Dev forum--that's probably your best/easiest bet. RSS will also do it, but it's not as user-friendly.
